problem_text: In Fig. 21-28a, particles 1 and 2 have charge $20.0 \mu \mathrm{C}$ each and are held at separation distance $d=1.50$ $\mathrm{m}$. What is the magnitude of the electrostatic force on particle 1 due to particle 2? In Fig. 21-28b, particle 3 of charge $20.0 \mu \mathrm{C}$ is positioned so as to complete an equilateral triangle.
